front.title: E-web Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on any site. May be moved with two warriors for 1 additional Force. Your warrior present may target a starfighter (use 5 as defense value), character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +1 > defense value.
front.lore: Massive infantry weapon powerful enough to damage even starfighters.

rulings: Moving the E-web Blaster does not permit those carrying it to make an extra move.
Normal movement costs apply to the characters moving the E-web Blaster.
The characters moving the E-web Blaster move with it, using landspeed, simultaneously.
